name: metahkg
description: Metahkg is a free and open source lihkg-style forum.

scripts.deploy: cd metahkg-server && yarn run deploy & cd metahkg-web && yarn run deploy
scripts.docker: cd docker && docker-compose pull metahkg-images metahkg-imgpush metahkg-mongo metahkg-redis && docker-compose up -d --build
scripts.docker:prebuilt: cd docker && docker-compose pull --ignore-pull-failures && docker-compose build metahkg-nginx && docker-compose up -d
scripts.docker:vpn: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose.vpn.yml pull metahkg-images metahkg-imgpush metahkg-mongo metahkg-redis metahkg-protonvpn && docker-compose -f docker-compose.vpn.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:vpn:prebuilt: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose.vpn.yml pull --ignore-pull-failures && docker-compose -f docker-compose.vpn.yml build metahkg-nginx && docker-compose -f docker-compose.vpn.yml up -d
scripts.docker:vpn:express: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose.vpn.express.yml pull metahkg-images metahkg-imgpush metahkg-mongo metahkg-redis metahkg-protonvpn metahkg-mongo-express && docker-compose -f docker-compose.vpn.express.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:vpn:express:prebuilt: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose.vpn.express.yml pull --ignore-pull-failures && docker-compose -f docker-compose.vpn.express.yml build metahkg-nginx && docker-compose -f docker-compose.vpn.express.yml up -d
scripts.docker:express: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose.express.yml pull metahkg-images metahkg-imgpush metahkg-mongo metahkg-redis metahkg-mongo-express && docker-compose -f docker-compose.express.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:express:prebuilt: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose.express.yml pull --ignore-pull-failures && docker-compose -f docker-compose.express.yml build metahkg-nginx && docker-compose -f docker-compose.express.yml up -d
scripts.docker:clean: docker images -a | grep '<none>' | awk '{print $3}' | xargs docker rmi

author: wcyat
